Package entity.base

Class Candy

java.lang.Object
entity.base.Candy
All Implemented Interfaces:
Renderable
Direct Known Subclasses:
PoisonousCandy
public class Candy
extends Object
implements Renderable
The Class Candy. Represents candies that ants will bring home to grow its colony and give money.
